processingResourceMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.io.jwpl.WikipediaQueryReader
processingResourceMetaData.description: Reads all article pages that match a query created by the numerous parameters of this class.
processingResourceMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: MaxCategories
configurationParameter.description: Maximum number of categories. Articles with a higher number of categories will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MinCategories
configurationParameter.description: Minimum number of categories. Articles with a lower number of categories will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MaxInlinks
configurationParameter.description: Maximum number of incoming links. Articles with a higher number of incoming links will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MinInlinks
configurationParameter.description: Minimum number of incoming links. Articles with a lower number of incoming links will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MaxOutlinks
configurationParameter.description: Maximum number of outgoing links. Articles with a higher number of outgoing links will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MinOutlinks
configurationParameter.description: Minimum number of outgoing links. Articles with a lower number of outgoing links will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MaxRedirects
configurationParameter.description: Maximum number of redirects. Articles with a higher number of redirects will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MinRedirects
configurationParameter.description: Minimum number of redirects. Articles with a lower number of redirects will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MaxTokens
configurationParameter.description: Maximum number of tokens. Articles with a higher number of tokens will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: MinTokens
configurationParameter.description: Minimum number of tokens. Articles with a lower number of tokens will not be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: TitlePattern
configurationParameter.description: SQL-style title pattern. Only articles that match the pattern will be returned by the query.

configurationParameter.name: OnlyFirstParagraph
configurationParameter.description: If set to true, only the first paragraph instead of the whole article is used.

configurationParameter.name: OutputPlainText
configurationParameter.description: Whether the reader outputs plain text or wiki markup.

configurationParameter.name: PageBuffer
configurationParameter.description: The page buffer size (#pages) of the page iterator.

configurationParameter.name: PageIdsFromFile
configurationParameter.description: Defines the path to a file containing a line-separated list of page ids of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageTitleFromFile
configurationParameter.description: Defines the path to a file containing a line-separated list of page titles of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageIdFromArray
configurationParameter.description: Defines an array of page ids of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: PageTitlesFromArray
configurationParameter.description: Defines an array of page titles of the pages that should be retrieved. (Optional)

configurationParameter.name: Host
configurationParameter.description: The host server.

configurationParameter.name: Database
configurationParameter.description: The name of the database.

configurationParameter.name: User
configurationParameter.description: The username of the database account.

configurationParameter.name: Password
configurationParameter.description: The password of the database account.

configurationParameter.name: Language
configurationParameter.description: The language of the Wikipedia that should be connected to.

configurationParameter.name: CreateDBAnno
configurationParameter.description: Sets whether the database configuration should be stored in the CAS, so that annotators down the pipeline can access additional data.
